==Chinese==

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|工|t1=work|口|t2=mouth, talk|又|t3=hand|寸|t4=hand|ls=ic}} – to seek out, with hands and mouth (asking).

Note that top hand is not in {{zh-l|*又}} shape, but rather resembles {{zh-l|*彐}}; this is an earlier form of hand (fingers); see etymology of {{zh-l|*又}}.
